item.title: (X01) - Only Perfection Provides Safety!
item.description: Watch the first exklusive video-podcast and get to know why TYROLIA provides the best ski bindings worlwide. The ski binding as the connecting part between ski and boot/skier is the key to exciting skiing pleasure and skiing without getting hurt. Enjoy the day in the mountains.
item.itunes:author: TYROLIA / Production: create.at
item.itunes:subtitle: Watch the first exklusive video-podcast and get to know why TYROLIA provides the best ski bindings worlwide. The ski binding as the connecting part between ski and boot/skier is the key to exciting skiing pleasure and skiing without getting hurt. Enjoy the day in the mountains.

item.title: Girls & Boys on the Slope
item.description: Wer ist das Women-Team von HEAD TYROLIA? Was gibt es in den nächsten Episoden?
item.itunes:author: Head Tyrolia

item.title: HEAD TYROLIA Women Episode 1
item.description: Get to know the 13 specialists. The who is who of the HEAD TYROLIA women's team. Eveline Stremitzer, Natalie Morel, Allison Ganett, Lisa Densmore, Marte Karlsen and Karolina Johansson...
item.itunes:author: HEAD TYROLIA
item.itunes:subtitle: Get to know the 13 specialists. Especially Eveline Stremitzer, Natalie Morel, Allison Ganett, Lisa Densmore, Marte Karlsen and Karolina Johansson - one part of the HEAD TYROLIA women's team. Subscribe to get the following episodes to learn more about “For Women by Women”
item.itunes:summary: The specialists getting introduced. 13 women from the international women’s team. Get to know more details about why and how to develop a totally new product line, including, ski, boots and bindings, top secret and fun! Get to know: Eveline Stremitzer, Natalie Morel, Allison Ganett, Lisa Densmore, Marte Karlsen and Karolina Johansson. The who is who of the HEAD TYROLIA women's team.

item.title: Girls & Boys on the Slope II (DE)
item.description: HEAD TYROLIA Women Line – die Kollektion von Frauen für Frauen.
item.itunes:author: Head Tyrolia
item.itunes:subtitle: Von internationalen Ski- und Sportprofis entwickelt: modebewusst vom Ski bis zum Schuh, Frau bewegt sich anders, dreht und steht anders. Was ist besonders wichtig für die Kollektion. Spezieller Sidecut, Skiworldcup, Winter, Wintersport, Skifahren, Österreich, Ski worldcup. Ski, Bindung, Schuh
item.itunes:summary: Ski Equipment from HEAD TYROLIA, Winter, ski world cup, Zahrobska Sarka, Bergmann-Schmuderer Monika, Gerg Annemarie, Riesch Maria, Putzer Karen, Lalive Caroline, Sponring Christine und das Women team: Homma Ami, Jeanette Collenberg, Natalie A. Morel, Gabi Gstöhl, Eveline Stremnitzer, Heidi Paul, Christine Grabmair
